content: eyes now if you re using them in between row 7 & 8 near the brown forehead as shown in the pictures then stuff the nose since you won t be able to get to it later on ** 14 w 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet same as joining single_crochet in next 18 single_crochet increase in last 2 single_crochet 24 15 w work even 24 16 in this row you ll use brown and black along with the white 26 w 2 single_crochet b 8 single_crochet w 1 single_crochet 2 increase a 1 single_crochet b 8 single_crochet w 2 single_crochet stuff the head firmly now stuff the body as you go along 17 work even 26 w 2 single_crochet b 10 single_crochet w 3 single_crochet a 3 single_crochet b 5 single_crochet w 3 single_crochet 18 work even 26 w 3 single_crochet b 4 single_crochet a 4 single_crochet b 5 single_crochet a 2 single_crochet b 6 single_crochet w 2 single_crochet 19 work even 26 w 3 single_crochet b 5 single_crochet a 3 single_crochet b 5 single_crochet a 4 single_crochet b 4 single_crochet w 2 single_crochet 20 work even 26 w 4 single_crochet b 6 single_crochet a 1 single_crochet b 5 single_crochet a 1 single_crochet b 6 single_crochet w 3 single_crochet 21 w 3 single_crochet b 10 single_crochet increase in next 2 single_crochet 1 single_crochet a 2 single_crochet b 8 single_crochet 28 you re done with the black now you can cut it off and weave it in  22 w 7 single_crochet b 3 single_crochet 1 increase 10 single_crochet 1 increase 6 single_crochet 30 23 work even 30 w 9 single_crochet b 21 single_crochet page 4 of 9 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com 24 work even 30 w 11 single_crochet b 17 single_crochet w 2 single_crochet 25 work even 30 w 10 single_crochet b 18 single_crochet w 2 single_crochet you re done with the white now woo-hoo cut it off and weave it in 26 the remaining row are done all in brown 24 if you haven t been doing it before start stuffing the body and if you have stuff it more make it firm but not so the stitches are stretched out *single_crochet in 3 single_crochet 1 decrease* around 27 *2 single_crochet 1 decrease* around 16 28 *decrease over 2 single_crochet* around 8 **stuff more of the body at this point ** bind off leaving an 8 tail thread the tail through the remaining stitches and pull it tight to close up the hole tuck the tail under several stitches and cut off the tail mouth and tongue mouth *using white* chain 3 and in second chain from hook make 6 double crochets bind off do not join to the first stitch and leave a long tail tongue *using red* chain 2 in second chain from hook make 1 single_crochet bind off leaving a small tail and do your best to weave the ends into that tiny piece use the starting tail from the
